document_data.name: Turnbetl
document_data.mainbody: '''Turnbetl''' was the largest and closest satellite of [[H'Catha]], the farthest planet from the [[the sun|Sun]] in [[Realmspace]].
document_data.Geography:
The spherical moon orbited H'Catha along the plane of the flat disc in a very eccentric orbit, with a perigee distance of {{SI|11500|mi|k|long=yes}} and an apogee of {{SI|413000|mi|k|long=yes}}.

The moon's atmosphere was extremely unstable, composed of highly reactive gases that immediately exploded upon contact with oxygen. The typical atmosphere of a medium-sized [[spelljammer]] could produce an explosion several times stronger than a ''[[fireball]]'' cast by an experienced [[wizard]]â€•enough to be decidedly lethal.
document_data.Defenses: Due to the extremely dangerous nature of Turnbetl, it was recommended that the moon be kept in quarantine so travelers did not approach it.
